tool_description: Generates comprehensive formatted reports combining multiple analytical outputs into professional return analytics documents.

report_title.description: Title for the generated analytics report

report_period.description: Time period covered by the report

include_executive_summary.description: Whether to include an executive summary section

include_charts.description: Whether to include data visualization descriptions

target_audience.description: Primary audience: executives, managers, analysts, operations

metrics_data.description: Key metrics to include in the report

error_messages: Invalid report format: Use one of [summary, detailed, comprehensive]
Invalid target audience: Use one of [executives, managers, analysts, operations]
Missing report data: At least one data input (metrics, trends, insights, etc.) must be provided
Invalid report period: Period must be a valid date-time string
usage: Provide report_title and report_period as minimum requirements. Include various analytical data arrays to populate the report sections. Configure report_format and target_audience to tailor the output style.

key_findings.description: Summary of key findings from the analysis

report_length.description: Length of generated report in words
